inventory=[{"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 42}]
thought: I need to craft spruce_wood, and spruce_wood requires 4 spruce_log, so I will first move one of the spruce_log from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
